channel.title: Need guidance for mobile security
channel.description:
Hi everyone. I am new 'script kiddie' in this info sec world. Currently exploring 'mobile security'. I have tried some books and blogs. But I am not understanding well by this. There are some good online course but I can not afford to buy them now.
Can anyone recommend any video tutorial (freely available) for 'mobile security' ?
As a new student, it becomes hard sometime to find a good resource. That's why asking for expert help.
Thanks.

item.title: Need guidance for mobile security
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
